messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is Anthony Flinders's field of study?
a history student
You are a helpful assistant.
Why was Anthony Flinders unable to join Professor Leiter's team?
he was repeatedly rebuffed
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the topic of Anthony Flinders's proposed thesis?
the Arkham Witch Trials
You are a helpful assistant.
What are some of Anthony Flinders's claimed interests?
purely in the pursuit of his proposed thesis
You are a helpful assistant.
What was the main subject of Anthony Flinders' proposed thesis?
the Arkham Witch Trials
You are a helpful assistant.
Why was Anthony Flinders rebuffed by Professor Leiter?
because Leiter was a criminal and forger, and a good judge of character
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be said about Anthony Flinders' social life at the university?
that he superficially fits in and is a student with an unremarkable academic record, but has underlying unease from those who know him
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be said about Anthony Flinders' academic record?
that it is unremarkable
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Anthony Flinders' area of focus for his historical studies?
the Arkham Witch Trials
You are a helpful assistant.
Why was Leiter's refusal to join the thesis considered by the man as a good judge of character?
because he is a criminal and a forger
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Anthony Flinders like in terms of his academic record?
He has an unremarkable academic record.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Anthony Flinders secretly obsessed with?
The witch trials.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the nature of Anthony Flinders' beliefs?
He is a self-made Satanist with a mangled creed from a dozen biblical and historical sources.
You are a helpful assistant.
What can be inferred about Anthony Flinders from those who have spent time with him?
He has an underlying unease from those who have spent extended time with him.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does T Flinders know about the Arkham Witch Trials?
T Flinders possesses an obsessive's knowledge about the Arkham Witch Trials.
You are a helpful assistant.
Why did T Flinders break into Leiter's house?
T Flinders broke into Leiter's house on September 11th in search of the papers.
You are a helpful assistant.
What does T Flinders want to achieve by getting the papers?
T Flinders is enthusiastic to secure the papers for his own private purposes.
You are a helpful assistant.
Will T Flinders help the investigators?
T Flinders will 'help' the investigators—whether they want him to or not.
You are a helpful assistant.
What motivates Flinders to behave in certain ways?
He's perfectly willing to use violence to achieve his aims, so long as he believes he can get away with it or the reward outweighs the risk.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Flinders's personality like?
A borderline psychotic and certainly delusional
You are a helpful assistant.
What is Flinders willing to do to achieve his aims?
Use violence
You are a helpful assistant.
What happens if Flinders is snubbed?
He will balk at open attack for fear of being overpowered or arrested
